callback_with_context.context_function_id: (current_total = PooledResourceList.FirstContext.Total) =>Format(Loc("wh3_dlc27_arcane_power_bar_label_tooltip"), current_total) + GetIf(LowerBound > current_total, Format(Loc("wh3_dlc27_arcane_power_bar_next_tier_label_tooltip"), LowerBound - current_total))
